name: Layered Architecture
tagline: An education dive into designing layered architecture for applications.
body:
### Welcome to my small personal side project.
This is simply an application framework maintained by my in order to try and build a solid set of libraries to allow a developer to build well structured applications.
I try to make use of MVC, IOC via structuremap, Entity Framework, Rhino Service Bus and so on:

### To Check it out simply perform the following in your git bash
```
$ git clone https://github.com/Foxpips/LayeredArchitecture.git
```

### Designer Templates
The main purpose of this project is to allow me to experiment with different nuget packages, experiment with c# and 
try to build a decent set of core libraries in a sensible manner that can be easily maintained and added to.
My main goal is to develop a definitive set of classes, interfaces, structs, services etc that will form a solid base layer for any team starting to write a set of core libraries etc.
